title: How Can I Help You?
dc:creator: Tyler Folkman
content:encoded:
As a subscriber to my email list, I’d like to thank you for taking the time to join our community. That being said, I realize I have not been consistent in providing value to you.

I’d like to fix that.

To do so, I’d love your thoughts on how I could be most helpful.

If you could take about 2 minutes to answer the following survey (only 8 questions), it would be incredibly helpful.

https://forms.gle/SyhkD7t8Ma6hUv7U8

Thanks again for your time and I look forward to great things to come.

—Tyler
